quote: Let him who would enjoy a good future waste none of his present.
name: Roger Babson

quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes one day at a time.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Lost time is never found again.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of 60 minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: If you don't have time to do it right, when will you have time to do it over?
name: John Wooden

quote: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: Time is money.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: You may delay, but time will not.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: We are time's subjects, and time bids be gone.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Time has been transformed, and we have changed it has advanced and set us in motion it has unveiled its face, inspiring us with bewilderment and exhilaration.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: We must use time wisely and forever realize that the time is always ripe to do right.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.

quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.

quote: Everything happens to everybody sooner or later if there is time enough.

quote: Time is but the stream I go a-fishing in.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.

quote: You can never plan the future by the past.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: It is strange that the years teach us patience that the shorter our time, the greater our capacity for waiting.
name: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: Until you value yourself, you won't value your time. Until you value your time, you will not do anything with it.

quote: Yesterday's the past, tomorrow's the future, but today is a gift. That's why it's called the present.

quote: Time = Life, Therefore, waste your time and waste of your life, or master your time and master your life.

quote: For disappearing acts, it's hard to beat what happens to the eight hours supposedly left after eight of sleep and eight of work.
name: Doug Larson

quote: It is my feeling that Time ripens all things with Time all things are revealed Time is the father of truth.
name: Francois Rabelais

quote: I must govern the clock, not be governed by it.
name: Golda Meir

quote: What then is time? If no one asks me, I know what it is. If I wish to explain it to him who asks, I do not know.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: In all our deeds, the proper value and respect for time determines success or failure.
name: Malcolm X

quote: Day, n. A period of twenty-four hours, mostly misspent.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: The time I kill is killing me.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Time moves in one direction, memory in another.
name: William Gibson

quote: Know how to live the time that is given you.
name: Dario Fo

quote: Finding some quiet time in your life, I think, is hugely important.
name: Mariel Hemingway

quote: Hide nothing, for time, which sees all and hears all, exposes all.
name: Sophocles

quote: Much may be done in those little shreds and patches of time which every day produces, and which most men throw away.

quote: By the time we've made it, we've had it.
name: Malcolm Forbes

quote: You must have been warned against letting the golden hours slip by but some of them are golden only because we let them slip by.
name: James M. Barrie

quote: Time is the longest distance between two places.
name: Tennessee Williams

quote: Men talk of killing time, while time quietly kills them.
name: Dion Boucicault

quote: Wisdom is the power to put our time and our knowledge to the proper use.
name: Thomas J. Watson

quote: Time brings all things to pass.
name: Aeschylus

quote: But time growing old teaches all things.
name: Aeschylus

quote: So during those first moments of the day, which are yours and yours alone, you can circumvent these boundaries and concentrate fully on spiritual matters. And this gives you the opportunity to plan the time management of the entire day.
name: Menachem Mendel Schneerson

quote: Work is hard. Distractions are plentiful. And time is short.
name: Adam Hochschild

quote: Time, whose tooth gnaws away everything else, is powerless against truth.

quote: I want to go ahead of Father Time with a scythe of my own.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: Lose not yourself in a far off time, seize the moment that is thine.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Old age and the passage of time teach all things.
name: Sophocles

quote: Time has a way of demonstrating that the most stubborn are the most intelligent.
name: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

quote: The trouble with our times is that the future is not what it used to be.
name: Paul Valery

quote: Both young children and old people have a lot of time on their hands. That's probably why they get along so well.
name: Jonathan Carroll

quote: Time does not change us. It just unfolds us.
name: Max Frisch

quote: People who cannot find time for recreation are obliged sooner or later to find time for illness.

quote: Time makes heroes but dissolves celebrities.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: My time is now.
name: John Turner

quote: Lost wealth may be replaced by industry, lost knowledge by study, lost health by temperance or medicine, but lost time is gone forever.
name: Samuel Smiles

quote: I confess, I do not believe in time.
name: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Well-timed silence is the most commanding expression.
name: Mark Helprin

quote: And when is there time to remember, to sift, to weigh, to estimate, to total?
name: Tillie Olsen

quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
name: Pericles

quote: Time is the father of truth, its mother is our mind.
name: Giordano Bruno

quote: Time goes, you say? Ah, no! alas, time stays, we go.
name: Henry Austin Dobson

quote: I took some time out for life.
name: James L. Brooks

quote: Time is the school in which we learn, time is the fire in which we burn.
name: Delmore Schwartz

quote: When in doubt, take more time.
name: John Zimmerman

quote: Time is a beautiful thing. It's like when you meet an old lover on the street six years later and they don't look so ugly anymore.

quote: The best way to fill time is to waste it.

quote: The clock talked loud. I threw it away, it scared me what it talked.
name: Tillie Olsen

quote: There's time enough, but none to spare.
name: Charles W. Chesnutt

quote: Time was God's first creation.
name: Walter Lang

quote: O sweet, delusive Noon, Which the morning climbs to find, O moment sped too soon, And morning left behind.
name: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: The present is a point just passed.
name: David Russell

quote: Time is a dressmaker specializing in alterations.
name: Faith Baldwin

quote: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. name: Steve Jobs

quote: I value the friend who for me finds time on his calendar, but I cherish the friend who for me does not consult his calendar.

quote: We must reject the idea that every time a law's broken, society is guilty rather than the lawbreaker. It is time to restore the American precept that each individual is accountable for his actions.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.

quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.

quote: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.

quote: All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players: they have their exits and their entrances and one man in his time plays many parts, his acts being seven ages.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The time is always right to do what is right.

quote: Patriotism is supporting your country all the time, and your government when it deserves it.

quote: We shall not cease from exploration, and the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time.

name: Mark Twain

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
name: Confucius

quote: Children begin by loving their parents after a time they judge them rarely, if ever, do they forgive them.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Experience hath shewn, that even under the best forms of government those entrusted with power have, in time, and by slow operations, perverted it into tyranny.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.

quote: It is wonderful how much time good people spend fighting the devil. If they would only expend the same amount of energy loving their fellow men, the devil would die in his own tracks of ennui.

quote: That old law about 'an eye for an eye' leaves everybody blind. The time is always right to do the right thing.

name: Oscar Wilde

name: Robert H. Schuller

quote: I think and think for months and years. Ninety-nine times, the conclusion is false. The hundredth time I am right.

quote: We must use time creatively.

quote: There comes a time when the mind takes a higher plane of knowledge but can never prove how it got there.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Time is what prevents everything from happening at once.

quote: In a time of universal deceit - telling the truth is a revolutionary act.

quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.

quote: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
name: Mark Twain

quote: There is no better than adversity. Every defeat, every heartbreak, every loss, contains its own seed, its own lesson on how to improve your performance the next time.

quote: If patience is worth anything, it must endure to the end of time. And a living faith will last in the midst of the blackest storm.

name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any. It is wonderful how much may be done if we are always doing.

quote: Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.

quote: Life is like dancing. If we have a big floor, many people will dance. Some will get angry when the rhythm changes. But life is changing all the time.

quote: Some people see things that are and ask, Why? Some people dream of things that never were and ask, Why not? Some people have to go to work and don't have time for all that.

quote: Future. That period of time in which our affairs prosper, our friends are true and our happiness is assured.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: The very existence of flame-throwers proves that some time, somewhere, someone said to themselves, You know, I want to set those people over there on fire, but I'm just not close enough to get the job done.

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail.

quote: All things are subject to interpretation whichever interpretation prevails at a given time is a function of power and not truth.

quote: I suppose leadership at one time meant muscles but today it means getting along with people.

quote: The only time a woman really succeeds in changing a man is when he is a baby.

quote: People spend too much time finding other people to blame, too much energy finding excuses for not being what they are capable of being, and not enough energy putting themselves on the line, growing out of the past, and getting on with their lives.

quote: When I am getting ready to reason with a man, I spend one-third of my time thinking about myself and what I am going to say and two-thirds about him and what he is going to say.

name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Someone's sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.

quote: The time comes upon every public man when it is best for him to keep his lips closed.
name: Abraham Lincoln

name: Mark Twain

name: Mark Twain

quote: I'm the one that has to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life, the way I want to.

quote: The time is near at hand which must determine whether Americans are to be free men or slaves.
name: George Washington

quote: How did it get so late so soon? Its night before its afternoon. December is here before its June. My goodness how the time has flewn. How did it get so late so soon?

name: Maya Angelou

quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
name: Dale Evans

quote: Employ your time in improving yourself by other men's writings, so that you shall gain easily what others have labored hard for.

quote: Let us be sure that those who come after will say of us in our time, that in our time we did everything that could be done. We finished the race we kept them free we kept the faith.

quote: Our duty is to encourage every one in his struggle to live up to his own highest idea, and strive at the same time to make the ideal as near as possible to the Truth.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.
name: Julie Andrews

quote: This is no time for ease and comfort. It is time to dare and endure.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: It seems like every time you come up something happens to bring you back down.

quote: It is a mistake to look too far ahead. Only one link of the chain of destiny can be handled at a time.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: I have made it a rule never to smoke more that one cigar at a time.
name: Mark Twain

quote: The God who gave us life, gave us liberty at the same time.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Man will occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of the time he will pick himself up and continue on.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Someday, after mastering the winds, the waves, the tides and gravity, we shall harness for God the energies of love, and then, for a second time in the history of the world, man will have discovered fire.
name: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Everything that happens once can never happen again. But everything that happens twice will surely happen a third time.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.

quote: Drugs are a waste of time. They destroy your memory and your self-respect and everything that goes along with with your self-esteem. They're no good at all.

name: C. S. Lewis

name: Winston Churchill

quote: For time and the world do not stand still. Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or the present are certain to miss the future.

quote: One does not leave a convivial party before closing time.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: No idea is so outlandish that it should not be considered with a searching but at the same time a steady eye.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: I was about half in love with her by the time we sat down. That's the thing about girls. Every time they do something pretty... you fall half in love with them, and then you never know where the hell you are.
name: J. D. Salinger

quote: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: The game of basketball has been everything to me. My place of refuge, place I've always gone where I needed comfort and peace. name: Michael Jordan

quote: It takes time to persuade men to do even what is for their own good.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
name: Marie Curie

quote: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: New Year's Resolution: To tolerate fools more gladly, provided this does not encourage them to take up more of my time.
name: James Agate

quote: If there are no stupid questions, then what kind of questions do stupid people ask? Do they get smart just in time to ask questions?
name: Scott Adams

quote: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: Peace is a journey of a thousand miles and it must be taken one step at a time.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Always remember that the future comes one day at a time.
name: Dean Acheson

quote: In time we hate that which we often fear.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The only difference between death and taxes is that death doesn't get worse every time Congress meets.
name: Will Rogers

quote: At the end of your life, you will never regret not having passed one more test, not winning one more verdict or not closing one more deal. You will regret time not spent with a husband, a friend, a child, or a parent.
name: Barbara Bush

quote: If it's very painful for you to criticize your friends - you're safe in doing it. But if you take the slightest pleasure in it, that's the time to hold your tongue.
name: Alice Duer Miller

quote: Time spent with cats is never wasted.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: A man begins cutting his wisdom teeth the first time he bites off more than he can chew.
name: Herb Caen

quote: Every time I plant a seed, He say kill it before it grow, he say kill it before they grow.
name: Bob Marley

quote: I wasted time, and now doth time waste me.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: If you can look into the seeds of time, and say which grain will grow and which will not, speak then unto me.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Campaign behavior for wives: Always be on time. Do as little talking as humanly possible. Lean back in the parade car so everybody can see the president.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Time and the hour run through the roughest day.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Long before history began we men have got together apart from the women and done things. We had time.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: You're just left with yourself all the time, whatever you do anyway. You've got to get down to your own God in your own temple. It's all down to you, mate.
name: John Lennon

quote: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Take time for all things: great haste makes great waste.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Nature hath framed strange fellows in her time.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: When we were children we were grateful to those who filled our stockings at Christmas time. Why are we not grateful to God for filling our stockings with legs?
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: It is impossible for you to be angry and laugh at the same time. Anger and laughter are mutually exclusive and you have the power to choose either.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: The time to repair the roof is when the sun is shining.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: Thanksgiving is a time when the world gets to see just how blessed and how workable the Christian system is. The emphasis is not on giving or buying, but on being thankful and expressing that appreciation to God and to one another.
name: John Clayton

quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Everywhere is within walking distance if you have the time.
name: Steven Wright

quote: Let the word go forth from this time and place, to friend and foe alike, that the torch has been passed to a new generation of Americans - born in this century, tempered by war, disciplined by a hard and bitter peace.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: Do not waste your time on Social Questions. What is the matter with the poor is Poverty what is the matter with the rich is Uselessness.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: It's time to fundamentally change the way that we do business in Washington. To help build a new foundation for the 21st century, we need to reform our government so that it is more efficient, more transparent, and more creative. That will demand new thinking and a new sense of responsibility for every dollar that is spent.
name: Barack Obama

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The test of a first-rate intelligence is the ability to hold two opposed ideas in mind at the same time and still retain the ability to function.
name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time. The only people who never tumble are those who never mount the high wire. This is your moment. Own it.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: No matter what time it is, wake me, even if it's in the middle of a Cabinet meeting.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Leisure is the time for doing something useful. This leisure the diligent person will obtain the lazy one never.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I existed from all eternity and, behold, I am here and I shall exist till the end of time, for my being has no end.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Happiness is the only good. The time to be happy is now. The place to be happy is here. The way to be happy is to make others so.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: If a man walks in the woods for love of them half of each day, he is in danger of being regarded as a loafer. But if he spends his days as a speculator, shearing off those woods and making the earth bald before her time, he is deemed an industrious and enterprising citizen.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Each year one vicious habit discarded, in time might make the worst of us good.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: There never was a truly great man that was not at the same time truly virtuous.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: If time be of all things the most precious, wasting time must be the greatest prodigality.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: We must use time as a tool, not as a couch.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: It is a grand mistake to think of being great without goodness and I pronounce it as certain that there was never a truly great man that was not at the same time truly virtuous.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Employ thy time well, if thou meanest to gain leisure.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: When your time comes to die, be not like those whose hearts are filled with fear of death, so that when their time comes they weep and pray for a little more time to live their lives over again in a different way. Sing your death song, and die like a hero going home.
name: Tecumseh

quote: Beauty is unbearable, drives us to despair, offering us for a minute the glimpse of an eternity that we should like to stretch out over the whole of time.
name: Albert Camus

quote: I've been on a calendar, but I've never been on time.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: I cannot believe in a God who wants to be praised all the time.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: This time, like all times, is a very good one, if we but know what to do with it.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Little minds have little worries, big minds have no time for worries.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We praise a man who feels angry on the right grounds and against the right persons and also in the right manner at the right moment and for the right length of time.
name: Aristotle

quote: Don't waste time on jealousy. Sometimes you're ahead, sometimes you're behind.
name: Mary Schmich

quote: The sum of wisdom is that time is never lost that is devoted to work.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Who hears me, who understands me, becomes mine, a possession for all time.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I'm concentrating on staying healthy, having peace, being happy, remembering what is important, taking in nature and animals, spending time reading, trying to understand the universe, where science and the spiritual meet.

name: Alex Lifeson

quote: I don't even drink! I can't stand the taste of alcohol. Every New Year's Eve I try one drink and every time it makes me feel sick. So I don't touch booze - I'm always the designated driver.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: In our time political speech and writing are largely the defense of the indefensible.
name: George Orwell

quote: There is never time in the future in which we will work out our salvation. The challenge is in the moment the time is always now.
name: James A. Baldwin

quote: My top most priority is to deal with India's massive social and economic problems, so that chronic poverty, ignorance and disease can be conquered in a reasonably short period of time.
name: Manmohan Singh

quote: As things are, and as fundamentally they must always be, poetry is not a career, but a mug's game. No honest poet can ever feel quite sure of the permanent value of what he has written: He may have wasted his time and messed up his life for nothing.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: You can't live your life blaming your failures on your parents and what they did or didn't do for you. You're dealt the cards that you're dealt. I realised it was a waste of time to be angry at my parents and feel sorry for myself.

quote: Leadership to me means duty, honor, country. It means character, and it means listening from time to time.

quote: You are your greatest asset. Put your time, effort and money into training, grooming, and encouraging your greatest asset.
name: Tom Hopkins

quote: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: If you believe in your heart that you are right, you must fight with all your might to do it your way. Only dead fish swim with the stream all the time.
name: Linda Ellerbee

quote: There is one thing stronger than all the armies in the world, and that is an idea whose time as come.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Greater than the tread of mighty armies is an idea whose time has come.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Religion is about turning untested belief into unshakable truth through the power of institutions and the passage of time.
name: Richard Dawkins

quote: Yet, taught by time, my heart has learned to glow for other's good, and melt at other's woe.
name: Homer

quote: Time is an illusion. Lunchtime doubly so.
name: Douglas Adams

quote: No trait is more justified than revenge in the right time and place.
name: Meir Kahane

quote: I never cut class. I loved getting A's, I liked being smart. I liked being on time. I thought being smart is cooler than anything in the world.
name: Michelle Obama

quote: Therefore I feel that the aforementioned guiding principle must be modified to read: If you desire peace, cultivate justice, but at the same time cultivate the fields to produce more bread otherwise there will be no peace.
name: Norman Borlaug

quote: Management by objective works - if you know the objectives. Ninety percent of the time you don't.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: Nature gives to every time and season some beauties of its own and from morning to night, as from the cradle to the grave, it is but a succession of changes so gentle and easy that we can scarcely mark their progress.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: Time discovers truth.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I just got tired of being sick and tired and feeling down. Unfortunately, you don't realize this until you're getting sober but the reason why you're depressed all the time is it's the drugs that are depressing you.
name: Steven Adler

quote: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.

quote: We see past time in a telescope and present time in a microscope. Hence the apparent enormities of the present.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: By the time a man gets to be presidential material, he's been bought ten times over.
name: Gore Vidal

quote: You are not a beautiful, unique snowflake... This is your life, and it's ending one minute at a time.

quote: There comes a time when deceit and defiance must be seen for what they are. At that point, a gathering danger must be directly confronted. At that point, we must show that beyond our resolutions is actual resolve.
name: Dick Cheney

quote: Under all speech that is good for anything there lies a silence that is better, Silence is deep as Eternity speech is shallow as Time.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: We are drowning in information, while starving for wisdom. The world henceforth will be run by synthesizers, people able to put together the right information at the right time, think critically about it, and make important choices wisely.
name: E. O. Wilson

quote: A play should give you something to think about. When I see a play and understand it the first time, then I know it can't be much good.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: I do have a close circle of friends and I am very fortunate to have them as friends. I feel very close to them I think friends are everything in life after your family. You come across lots of people all the time but you only make very few friends and you have to be true to them otherwise what's the point in life?
name: Shahrukh Khan

quote: People come in and out of our lives, and the true test of friendship is whether you can pick back up right where you left off the last time you saw each other.
name: Lisa See

quote: The time has come for all evangelists to practice full financial disclosure. The world is watching how we walk and how we talk. We must have the highest standards of morality, ethics and integrity if we are to continue to have influence.
name: Billy Graham

quote: A truer image of the world, I think, is obtained by picturing things as entering into the stream of time from an eternal world outside, than from a view which regards time as the devouring tyrant of all that is.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: You've got to stand up and do your own battles. My daddy taught me that a long time ago, that you fight your own battles. The only way to shut everybody up is to win.
name: Terry Bradshaw

quote: Time has no divisions to mark its passage, there is never a thunder-storm or blare of trumpets to announce the beginning of a new month or year. Even when a new century begins it is only we mortals who ring bells and fire off pistols.
name: Thomas Mann

quote: To achieve great things, two things are needed a plan, and not quite enough time.
name: Leonard Bernstein

quote: About the time we can make the ends meet, somebody moves the ends.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: I have made this letter longer than usual, only because I have not had the time to make it shorter.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: No greater thing is created suddenly, any more than a bunch of grapes or a fig. If you tell me that you desire a fig, I answer you that there must be time. Let it first blossom, then bear fruit, then ripen.
name: Epictetus

quote: If you're living in your time, you cannot help but to write about the things that are important.

quote: Go on failing. Go on. Only next time, try to fail better.
name: Samuel Beckett

quote: In seed time learn, in harvest teach, in winter enjoy.

quote: Every man regards his own life as the New Year's Eve of time.

quote: Most of the time I don't have much fun. The rest of the time I don't have any fun at all.
name: Woody Allen

quote: The freedom to fail is vital if you're going to succeed. Most successful people fail from time to time, and it is a measure of their strength that failure merely propels them into some new attempt at success.

name: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: We should not say that one man's hour is worth another man's hour, but rather that one man during an hour is worth just as much as another man during an hour. Time is everything, man is nothing: he is at the most time's carcass.

quote: I've spent too much time giving speeches, traveling the world.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Nobody sees a flower really it is so small. We haven't time, and to see takes time - like to have a friend takes time.

quote: Buying books would be a good thing if one could also buy the time to read them in: but as a rule the purchase of books is mistaken for the appropriation of their contents.

quote: Never bear more than one kind of trouble at a time. Some people bear three kinds of trouble - the ones they've had, the ones they have, and the ones they expect to have.

quote: Any time I got in emotional turmoil, I felt sick all the time, like at any minute I would die.

quote: Beauty is also submitted to the taste of time, so a beautiful woman from the Belle Epoch is not exactly the perfect beauty of today, so beauty is something that changes with time.

quote: Every time you don't follow your inner guidance, you feel a loss of energy, loss of power, a sense of spiritual deadness.

quote: The more time you spend contemplating what you should have done... you lose valuable time planning what you can and will do.

quote: I must uphold my ideals, for perhaps the time will come when I shall be able to carry them out.
name: Anne Frank

quote: The jealous are possessed by a mad devil and a dull spirit at the same time.
name: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quote: Black Consciousness is an attitude of the mind and a way of life, the most positive call to emanate from the black world for a long time.
name: Steven Biko

quote: If a little dreaming is dangerous, the cure for it is not to dream less but to dream more, to dream all the time.

quote: People say that if you find water rising up to your ankle, that's the time to do something about it, not when it's around your neck.

name: George Orwell

quote: Silence is as deep as eternity, speech a shallow as time.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Sometimes overturning brutal regimes takes time and costs lives. I wish it weren't so. I really, really do.
name: Hillary Clinton

name: Augustine of Hippo

quote: In books lies the soul of the whole past time.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Life gives you plenty of time to do whatever you want to do if you stay in the present moment.

name: T. S. Eliot

quote: There will come a time when you believe everything is finished. Yet that will be the beginning.

quote: If you are working 50 hours a week in a factory, you don't have time to read 10 newspapers a day and go back to declassified government archives. But such people may have far-reaching insights into the way the world works.

quote: I try to keep it real. I don't have time to worry about what I'm projecting to the world. I'm just busy being myself.

quote: Truth has no special time of its own. Its hour is now - always.

quote: Have regular hours for work and play make each day both useful and pleasant, and prove that you understand the worth of time by employing it well. Then youth will be delightful, old age will bring few regrets, and life will become a beautiful success.
name: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Viewed freely, the English language is the accretion and growth of every dialect, race, and range of time, and is both the free and compacted composition of all.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: Both in thought and in feeling, even though time be real, to realise the unimportance of time is the gate of wisdom.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: The slave is doomed to worship time and fate and death, because they are greater than anything he finds in himself, and because all his thoughts are of things which they devour.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: It's important to take time for your spouse and nurture the relationship.

quote: Freedom comes only to those who no longer ask of life that it shall yield them any of those personal goods that are subject to the mutations of time.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: It is even better to act quickly and err than to hesitate until the time of action is past.
name: Karl Von Clausewitz

quote: Everything comes in time to those who can wait.
name: Francois Rabelais

quote: As much as I would love to be a person that goes to parties and has a couple of drinks and has a nice time, that doesn't work for me. I'd just rather sit at home and read, or go out to dinner with someone, or talk to someone I love, or talk to somebody that makes me laugh.

quote: Don't get too comfortable with who you are at any given time - you may miss the opportunity to become who you want to be.

name: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

name: Stephen King

quote: I'm someone who loves to enjoy life and tries to focus on real things and real friendships. That's why I live very simply. I'm a jeans and T-shirt kind of girl. name: Cameron Diaz

quote: It is only in the world of objects that we have time and space and selves.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: I am learning all the time. The tombstone will be my diploma.
name: Eartha Kitt

quote: Don't be a time manager, be a priority manager. Cut your major goals into bite-sized pieces. Each small priority or requirement on the way to ultimate goal become a mini goal in itself.
name: Denis Waitley

name: Richard Dawkins

quote: I really had no great love for shoes. I was a working First Lady I was always in canvas shoes. I did nurture the shoes industry of the Philippines, and so every time there was a shoe fair, I would receive a pair of shoes as a token of gratitude.
name: Imelda Marcos

quote: A thing is mighty big when time and distance cannot shrink it.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Trust has to be earned, and should come only after the passage of time.
name: Arthur Ashe

quote: I think that everything is possible as long as you put your mind to it and you put the work and time into it. I think your mind really controls everything.
name: Michael Phelps

quote: Only good girls keep diaries. Bad girls don't have time.
name: Tallulah Bankhead

quote: Time always seems long to the child who is waiting - for Christmas, for next summer, for becoming a grownup: long also when he surrenders his whole soul to each moment of a happy day.
name: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: If neurotic is wanting two mutually exclusive things at one and the same time, then I'm neurotic as hell. I'll be flying back and forth between one mutually exclusive thing and another for the rest of my days.
name: Sylvia Plath

quote: The time to relax is when you don't have time for it.
name: Sydney J. Harris

quote: How can anybody hate nurses? Nobody hates nurses. The only time you hate a nurse is when they're giving you an enema.
name: Warren Beatty

quote: As anyone who has ever been around a cat for any length of time well knows, cats have enormous patience with the limitations of the human kind.
name: Cleveland Amory

quote: Time is bunk.
name: Douglas Adams

quote: The single most important thing in a child's performance is the quality of the teacher. Making sure a child spends the maximum amount of time with inspirational teachers is the most important thing.
name: Michael Gove

quote: It's time to say goodbye, but I think goodbyes are sad and I'd much rather say hello. Hello to a new adventure.
name: Ernie Harwell

quote: I have found it advisable not to give too much heed to what people say when I am trying to accomplish something of consequence. Invariably they proclaim it can't be done. I deem that the very best time to make the effort.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Do not think of your faults, still less of other's faults look for what is good and strong, and try to imitate it. Your faults will drop off, like dead leaves, when their time comes.
name: John Ruskin

quote: The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
name: Josh Billings

quote: First love is a kind of vaccination which saves a man from catching the complaint the second time.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Next time I tell you someone from Texas should not be president of the United States, please pay attention.
name: Molly Ivins

quote: I wish life was not so short, he thought. languages take such a time, and so do all the things one wants to know about.
name: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: Laws are silent in time of war.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: If I hold back, I'm no good. I'm no good. I'd rather be good sometimes, than holding back all the time.
name: Janis Joplin

quote: It's the same each time with progress. First they ignore you, then they say you're mad, then dangerous, then there's a pause and then you can't find anyone who disagrees with you.
name: Tony Benn

quote: Time is the most precious element of human existence. The successful person knows how to put energy into time and how to draw success from time.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: To keep it simple you run your gym like you run your house. Keep it clean and in good running order. No jerks allowed, members pay on time and if they give you any crap, throw them out. There's peace where there's order.
name: Joe Gold

quote: Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: I feel when somebody has been playing cricket for a long time, he creates a separate identity for himself.
name: Sachin Tendulkar

quote: I live in a crazy time.
name: Anne Frank

quote: A man may speak very well in the House of Commons, and fail very completely in the House of Lords. There are two distinct styles requisite: I intend, in the course of my career, if I have time, to give a specimen of both.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: People have taken time out of their day and spent their money to come sit down at a concert. And it's jazz music-it's not easy for them to get to it. I don't want them ever to feel that I'm taking their presence lightly.
name: Wynton Marsalis

quote: Computers may save time but they sure waste a lot of paper. About 98 percent of everything printed out by a computer is garbage that no one ever reads.
name: Andy Rooney

quote: When it's time for me to walk away from something, I walk away from it. My mind, my body, my conscience tell me that enough is enough.
name: Jerry West

quote: It is easier to be a lover than a husband for the simple reason that it is more difficult to be witty every day than to say pretty things from time to time.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Not a single time have we gotten a right from Congress or from the President. We get them from God.
name: Glenn Beck

quote: I'm trying to stay as calm as possible and focus one day at a time, but when reality sets in, I feel everything: anxiety, excitement, nerves, pressure and joy.
name: Shawn Johnson

quote: One of the most pervasive political visions of our time is the vision of liberals as compassionate and conservatives as less caring.
name: Thomas Sowell

quote: We are at the very beginning of time for the human race. It is not unreasonable that we grapple with problems. But there are tens of thousands of years in the future. Our responsibility is to do what we can, learn what we can, improve the solutions, and pass them on.
name: Richard P. Feynman

quote: If you start using a medication in a person with autism, you should see an obvious improvement in behavior in a short period of time. If you do not see an obvious improvement, they probably should not be taking the stuff. It is that simple.
name: Temple Grandin

quote: Boredom is the feeling that everything is a waste of time serenity, that nothing is.
name: Thomas Szasz

quote: The innocent and the beautiful have no enemy but time.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: In wisdom gathered over time I have found that every experience is a form of exploration.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: Yet, when child sex offenders are brought to justice and serve time for their offenses, they are often released into unsuspecting communities and left free to resume their sexual attacks.
name: Bob Ney

quote: Future shock is the shattering stress and disorientation that we induce in individuals by subjecting them to too much change in too short a time.
name: Alvin Toffler

quote: Any time three New Yorkers get into a cab without an argument, a bank has just been robbed.
name: Phyllis Diller

quote: The most thought-provoking thing in our thought-provoking time is that we are still not thinking.
name: Martin Heidegger

quote: Every parent is at some time the father of the unreturned prodigal, with nothing to do but keep his house open to hope.
name: John Ciardi

quote: The pressure on young chefs today is far greater than ever before in terms of social skills, marketing skills, cooking skills, personality and, more importantly, delivering on the plate. So you need to be strong. Physically fit. So my chefs get weighed every time they come into the kitchen.
name: Gordon Ramsay

quote: My father wasn't around when I was a kid, and I used to always say, 'Why me? Why don't I have a father? Why isn't he around? Why did he leave my mother?' But as I got older I looked deeper and thought, 'I don't know what my father was going through, but if he was around all the time, would I be who I am today?'

quote: Voting is a right best exercised by people who have taken time to learn about the issues.
name: Tony Snow

quote: People who don't know me have opinions about me. That's the part that's very hurtful. Because how do you form an opinion about somebody if you've never met them or spent any time with them? So it's all based upon hearsay or things that they've read.
name: Rick Barry

quote: You get ideas from daydreaming. You get ideas from being bored. You get ideas all the time. The only difference between writers and other people is we notice when we're doing it.
name: Neil Gaiman

quote: To live in this world, you must be able to do three things: to love what is mortal to hold it against your bones knowing your own life depends on it and, when the time comes to let it go, to let it go.
name: Mary Oliver

quote: If I have to move up in a building, I choose the elevator over the escalator. Because one time I was riding the escalator and I tripped. I fell down the stairs for an hour and a half.
name: Demetri Martin

quote: I'm being treated like a sex object, cried the lady. No matter. I will take care of it, said Time soothingly.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Suicide, moreover, was at the time in vogue in Paris: what more suitable key to the mystery of life for a skeptical society?
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: No story is the same to us after a lapse of time or rather we who read it are no longer the same interpreters.
name: George Eliot

quote: Sixth grade was a big time, in my childhood, of hoops and friendship, and coming up with funny things.
name: Adam Sandler

quote: All of the great leaders have had one characteristic in common: it was the willingness to confront unequivocally the major anxiety of their people in their time. This, and not much else, is the essence of leadership.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: I do not read advertisements. I would spend all of my time wanting things.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: October is a fine and dangerous season in America. a wonderful time to begin anything at all. You go to college, and every course in the catalogue looks wonderful.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: I think an artist has always to be out of step with his time.
name: Orson Welles

quote: A lot of people would be embarrassed to admit that they were on 'Barney', but I embrace the fact. I just had such a wonderful time doing that show. I learned what a camera and prop is, and all that. I learned my manners too, so I guess that's a good thing!
name: Selena Gomez

quote: Nixon is one of the few in the history of this country to run for high office talking out of both sides of his mouth at the same time and lying out of both sides.
name: Harry S. Truman

quote: It's plain hokum. If you can't convince 'em, confuse 'em. It's an old political trick. But this time it won't work.
name: Harry S. Truman

quote: It's time to get real, folks. Hope and change ain't working. Hope and change is not a solution. Hope and change is not a job.
name: Herman Cain

quote: No country can act wisely simultaneously in every part of the globe at every moment of time.
name: Henry A. Kissinger

quote: To be a Negro in this country and to be relatively conscious is to be in a rage almost all the time.
name: James A. Baldwin
